meanings.sent1: The flower will emit a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The chimney will emit smoke when the fire is burning.
meanings.sent3: The cat will emit a loud meow when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The volcano will emit hot lava during an eruption.
meanings.sent5: The radio will emit static if the signal is weak.

meanings.sent1: The flashlight will emit a bright light in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The factory will emit harmful gases into the air.
meanings.sent3: The old car will emit strange noises when it starts.
meanings.sent4: The sun will emit warmth on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The candle will emit a pleasant scent when lit.

meanings.sent1: The machine will emit a loud noise when it's running.
meanings.sent2: The flower will emit pollen to attract bees.
meanings.sent3: The engine will emit smoke if it's not working properly.
meanings.sent4: The speaker will emit sound during a concert.
meanings.sent5: The volcano will emit ash into the sky.

meanings.sent1: The singer will emit beautiful melodies during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will emit instructions to the students.
meanings.sent3: The baby will emit loud cries when it's hungry.
meanings.sent4: The politician will emit promises during the campaign.
meanings.sent5: The bird will emit chirps in the morning.
